title: Learning Rate
desc:
How much the AI retains what it has learned recently 
Default:2.5e-4

title: Epochs
desc:
Number of times to train the AI 
Default:10001

title: Batch Size
desc:
How many frames to pass to the model at the same time
 Default: 32

title: Use Dueling Deep Q Network
desc:
Use a neural network made for 2 player games 
Default: False

title: Model evaluation frequency
desc:
How often to evaluate the model and save a video 
 Default: 500

title: Environment maximum timesteps calculation
desc:
Accompanying option to Max Number of Timesteps, which allows more fine grained control of how the maximum number of timesteps for an environment will be determined. 
 'override' will overwrite the environments maximum number of timesteps. 'lowest' will use the lowest between the environments default and specified maximum. 'highest' will use the highest between the two. 
Default: 'lowest'

title: Max number of timesteps
desc:
The maximum number of timesteps / frames before the game is ended. A very low number will result in the AI not learning. Set to a  
 Default: 2500

title: Device
desc: Device to run the AI on, will crash the program if your computer does not support it

title: Models folder
desc: Where to save and load the AI models from
